mainText:
You truly were a game changer. You took people with strong product 
loyalty to your competitors, and made them a mac user. I'm converted 
now, and I'm so sad it took me so long.

It's sad to lose a visionary just at the peak of everything. I'm sure 
you already set Apple up for the next decade, because you were just that 
innovative.

My condolences to your family, and to the rest of the world for losing 
the great Mr. Jobs.
author: Deniz
